about_the_game:
‘Annoying bald boss, hit him once, shiba itashita roka!’ is a [b]stress-relieving 3D action game in which you hit your bald boss and subordinates with a Harisen from right behind, so that they don't notice you. [/b]While your boss is looking the other way in the office, whack him on his bald head with a Harisen to relieve your daily frustration!

STORY.

You are forced to work late into the night, as your boss assigns you difficult tasks every day. You are forced to get on your boss's good side, and you are on the verge of exhaustion from the exhaustion of the day. Then one day, you discover a mysterious ‘Harisen’ in the warehouse. On it, written in old-fashioned characters, are the words: ‘Strike with this to relieve stress.

'Strike with this, and you'll be sure to relieve your stress!

You pick it up, half-convinced, and look up to see your bald boss, who is proudly giving you a sermon. ‘This is my last chance!’ You pick up the Harisen and head towards your boss...

Play time.

1~3 minutes

Video streaming

See official website

Translated with (free version)

name: ウザいハゲ上司は一発シバいたろか！

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Here's your chance to take out your frustrations on your bald boss, who is constantly forcing you to do unreasonable things on him! Aim at the boss in the office when he is not careful and hit his bald head with a Harisen! Watch your timing and give the bald head a clean hit to relieve stress!
